triples.name: Speech recognition
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates speech-based processing for TV content, which relies on speech recognition technology.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Speech-based TV content processing involves NLP techniques for understanding and processing spoken language.

triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The paper proposes the ETAPE corpus, a resource that exemplifies corpus linguistics methodology for French language analysis.

triples.name: Video content analysis
triples.relevance: TV content processing requires video content analysis techniques to handle multimedia data from television broadcasts.
